text: Kawther Ramzi () (17 June 1931 – 2 September 2018), was an Egyptian actress. She started her career in radio, then played small roles in cinema, theater and television. She was given a role closer to the tournament in the movie Call of Love.وفاة الفنانة كوثر رمزي Kawther was born on 17 June 1931, and her father was the artist Ibrahim Mohamed Fawzi, a theater heritage expert at the Institute of Dramatic Arts. She was married to the director of the security company Adco Pharmaceuticals, and did not have any children, and after his death at 21 years old, she completed her life with her brother Anwar Ramzi.نجت من مذبحة شقة «ذكرى» وأصيبت بالشلل.. 13 معلومة عن «كوثر رمزي» She debuted in 1954, and since then she participated in more than 70 films, including: Law kont rajol (1964), Nahr el hayat (1965), El hakiba el saouda (1964), Al-Hob Fi Taba (1992), and TV series like Al-Suqout Fi Bir Sabe (1994-present), Yawmeat Wanees (1994-2013) and Ahlam Al Fata Al Taeer (2015-2016). She acted with actors like Adel Emam. Kawther Ramzi received a certificate of appreciation from the late President Anwar Sadat.وداعًا كوثر رمزي...تعرّفوا على تفاصيل اللحظات الأخيرة في حياة الفنّانة الرّاحلة Kawthar emerged strongly under the spotlight after the murder of her Tunisian friend, Thekra and remained the strongest witness in the case.Survived the massacre of the apartment "memory" and became paralyzed. 13 Information about «Kawthar Ramzi» On 28 November 2003, Kawthar was in the house of Thekra, when the husband of her, the businessman and artist Ayman Al-Suwaidi, expelled her from home in bad ways. The next day she learned that a few minutes later there was the murder that would end the life of her friend and Tunisian singer.وفاة الفنانة المصرية كوثر رمزي She died on 2 September 2018, at the age of 87 years, due to a sharp drop in blood circulation.وفاة الفنانة المصرية كوثر رمزي Kawther suffered from paralysis of her leg and right hand due to a previous stroke. ==References== ==External links == * Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Egyptian film actresses Category:Egyptian Muslims Category:20th- century Egyptian actresses
title: Kawther Ramzi
